mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments(commentsId, content, bno, commentType, userId, secret) values(#{commentsId}, #{content},#{bno}, #{commentType}, #{userId}, #{secret})
mapper.select: select * from comments where bno = #{bno} and commentType = #{commentType} and (deleteYN IS NULL OR deleteYN != 1) order by commentsId DESC
mapper.update: update comments set deleteYN = 1 where commentsId = #{commentsId}
